thread.title: Chemically altered soil could help build sustainable homes

title: Chemically altered soil could help build sustainable homes
text:
Chemically altered soil could help build sustainable homes 9:44am EDT - 01:55
Scientists in the UK are developing a method to transform normal soil into a novel building material that could one day cut our dependence on traditional brick. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Scientists in the UK are developing a method to transform normal soil into a novel building material that could one day cut our dependence on traditional brick. Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Ku8Pyv
